byPassCollidesWindow(double, double) - Method in class slitherio.gameobjects.Snake
If the snake's head collides the rectangle delimited by (0,0) and (maxX, maxY), moves the snake to the opposite edge, to give the illusion that the snake crosses the edge of the rectangle and reappears on the other edge.
